chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 12 mini has the following issue:
Hello, 
The received phone presents a defect on the screen: two pixels do not function in the bottom left corner (image 3724).
Best regards,

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

You have received the product for repair or replacement, the 31/05/2024. The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. Without answer with a valid tracking link before the 06/06/2024 we will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding,
Bi Boti Didier Noel from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we have insufficient stocks available for an exchange. Instead we have fully refunded the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
